DOC.brief_summary: The goal research study learn quality life , sexual functioning , symptom woman undergone abdominal radical trachelectomy cervical cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Radical Trachelectomy Women With Early Stage Cervical Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Before Surgery : If agree take part study , abdominal radical trachelectomy surgery , follow information record one regular clinic visit : - Your race date birth . - Your complete medical surgical history , include date diagnosis diagnosis surgery . - Your weight , height , body mass index . During After Surgery : During surgery , follow information gather medical record ask : - If blood loss surgery . - How long surgery last . - If complication surgery . - If need blood transfusion . - What type instrument use prevent seal blood loss . - How long stayed hospital . - If experience infection within 1 month surgery . - If experience complication within 1 month later 1 month surgery . - The length time take recover bowel urinary function . - If receive treatment cancer surgery , radiation therapy , chemotherapy , hormonal therapy . Once year 5 year , return annual routine follow visit , result pap smear collect . Once year 5 year , also ask follow question health fertility , either mail regular clinic visit : - What status disease ? - Did want get pregnant last year ? - Did attempt get pregnant ? - Did become pregnant ? If , become pregnant outcome pregnancy ? If long try become pregnant try form assist reproduction ? Questionnaires : You complete 4-5 questionnaire follow time : - Within 2 week surgery . - At 4-6 week surgery - At 6 month surgery . - At 1 year surgery . - Once year next 4 year . These questionnaire ask physical health , mental emotional health , pain , vitality , social functioning , general health , quality life , sexual functioning . It take 15 minute complete 5 questionnaire . If receive follow-up care MD Anderson , questionnaires mail time-points prepaid return envelope . Mailed questionnaire return study chair envelope mark CONFIDENTIAL NO RETURN ADDRESS return envelope . Your name appear questionnaire return envelope . Instead , code use ( questionnaire ) connect questionnaires medical record . Only study chair study coordinator access code document . The document keep locked filing cabinet and/or password protect computer . All response store locked office . Length Study : You study 5 year . If disease return , take study . This investigational study . Up 100 patient enrol study . All enrol MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women histologically confirm , primary adenocarcinoma , squamous cell carcinoma adenosquamous carcinoma uterine cervix . 2 . Patients FIGO stage IA1 ( lymph vascular space invasion ) , IA2 , IB1 disease . 3 . Patients must suitable candidate surgery . 4 . Patients sign approve Informed Consent 5 . Patients prior malignancy allow > 3 year previous current evidence disease 6 . Females old 18 year undergoing radical trachelectomy 7 . Women must able read write either Spanish English 1 . Any histological type adenocarcinoma , squamous cell carcinoma adenosquamous carcinoma uterine cervix 2 . Tumor size great 4 cm 3 . FIGO stage IIIV disease 4 . Patients history pelvic abdominal radiotherapy 5 . Patients pregnant 6 . Patients contraindication surgery 7 . Patients evidence metastatic disease conventional imaging study , enlarge pelvic aortic lymph node > 2cm ; histologically positive lymph node
